items.sentence: Tom reached into his pocket, but his car keys weren\'t there.
Tom never told me he and Mary used to go out with each other.
Didn\'t you know that Tom lived in Australia for a long time?
I\'m on the platform now, waiting for Tom\'s train to arrive.
Mary tried on her wedding dress for the first time yesterday.
Tom didn\'t know Mary shouldn\'t be doing what she was doing.
Tom didn\'t know whether to accept Mary\'s love or refuse it.
Tom is having a hard time deciding what to wear to the party.
Tom is planning to take the first flight to Boston on Monday.
Tom is scheduled to give a concert in Boston on October 20th.
